title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1270.5 - Unauthorized use or occupancy of operational area prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1270.5 - Unauthorized use or occupancy of operational area prohibited

State Regulations

No person shall use or occupy an operational area for any
purpose whatsoever except a purpose pertaining to the servicing of tenants, concessionaires, airport users, or governmental agencies, or a purpose
connected with maintenance and operation of the air terminal, without
approval. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1270.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
